name: yellow-plugins
description: Personal curated collection of Claude Code plugins for development productivity and code quality

metadata.description: Git-native, schema-validated plugin marketplace for Claude Code

plugins.name: gt-workflow
plugins.description: Graphite-native workflow commands for stacked PRs, smart commits, sync, and stack navigation

plugins.name: yellow-core
plugins.description: Dev toolkit with review agents, research agents, and workflow commands for TypeScript, Python, Rust, and Go

plugins.name: yellow-linear
plugins.description: Linear MCP integration with PM workflows for issues, projects, initiatives, cycles, and documents

plugins.name: yellow-devin
plugins.description: Devin.AI V3 API integration — delegate tasks, manage sessions, research codebases via DeepWiki, orchestrate plan-implement-review chains

plugins.name: yellow-chatprd
plugins.description: ChatPRD MCP integration with document management and Linear bridging

plugins.name: yellow-review
plugins.description: Multi-agent PR review with adaptive agent selection, parallel comment resolution, and sequential stack review

plugins.name: yellow-ruvector
plugins.description: Persistent vector memory and semantic code search for Claude Code agents via ruvector

plugins.name: yellow-browser-test
plugins.description: Autonomous web app testing with agent-browser — auto-discovery, structured flows, and bug reporting

plugins.name: yellow-debt
plugins.description: Technical debt audit and remediation with parallel scanner agents for AI-generated code patterns

plugins.name: yellow-ci
plugins.description: CI failure diagnosis, workflow linting, and runner health management for self-hosted GitHub Actions runners

plugins.name: yellow-research
plugins.description: Deep research plugin with Perplexity, Tavily, EXA, and Parallel Task MCP servers. Code research inline; deep research saved to docs/research/.
